member.name: T:GTC.SwaggerParsing.SwaggerParser
member.summary: This class contains all of the code to read from a serialized copy of an Open API Specification document (from a json file or from the OAS definition URL on an API website) and convert it into a Microsoft OpenApiDocument. It can also serialize and save the document to a local file system.

member.summary: the local instance of the class containing

member.name: P:GTC.SwaggerParsing.SwaggerParser.apiDocument
member.summary: The object that holds the parsed OAS document

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the parser using the settings.json file in the root directory of the application.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the parser using the object that is passed in.
member.param: the pre-loaded settings object to use with this instance.

member.name: M:GTC.SwaggerParsing.SwaggerParser.CreateAndSaveDtoCode
member.summary: This method uses the NSwag Nuget package to generate C# source code for the OAS documented items. If no fileName is provided, the file is saved to the location specified in the settings file.

member.name: M:GTC.SwaggerParsing.SwaggerParser.CreateAndSaveDtoCode(System.String)
member.summary: This method uses the NSwag Nuget package to generate C# source code for the OAS documented items. If no fileName is provided, the file is saved to the location specified in the settings file.
member.param: the fully qualified name of the code file to save.
